abstract.para: The intended readers of this guide are developers who want to learn about GateIn developments and configurations.
This guide consists of the following main content:

listitem.para: Configuration: Provides you the knowledge about configurations of GateIn database and email service. This will help you customize and extend more functions for your product.

Portal development: Provides the knowledge about Portal skinning, some Portal's important configurations (Portal default configuration, Portal permission configuration, Portal navigation configuration, Internationalization configuration, etc), Data Import Strategy, Navigation Controller and other knowledge for developing Portal.
Portlet development: Provides you the basic knowledge about portlet development so you can develop your portlet in a Portal.
Gadget reference: Provides you the basic knowledge about gadget developments so you can deploy your gadget in a Portal.
Advanced development: Helps you further understand about the foundations of a portal system.
Authentication and Identity: Provides you the basic knowledge about authentication and identity of portals, such as information related to passwords, accounts, organization configuration.
Web Services for Remote Portlets (WSRP): Provides you the knowledge to deploy, configure and consume Web Services for Remote Portlets in GateIn.
